errors.name: MerkleProofTooDeep

errors.msg: Box is not owned by the caller
errors.name: NotBoxOwner

docs: Batch of inventory items with Merkle root for verification
Each batch stores dynamic metadata URIs that can be updated by admin.
This allows flexible package management without program redeployment.
types.name: Batch

docs: Unique batch identifier
fields.name: batch_id

docs: Candy Machine reference (optional, for verification)
Admin can link to external CM or leave as default
fields.name: candy_machine

docs: Merkle root of the inventory snapshot (for verification)
fields.name: merkle_root

docs: Timestamp when the snapshot was taken
fields.name: snapshot_time

docs: Total items in this batch's inventory
fields.name: total_items

docs: Number of boxes minted for this batch
fields.name: boxes_minted

docs: Number of boxes opened for this batch
fields.name: boxes_opened

docs: Bump seed for PDA
fields.name: bump

docs: Dynamic metadata URIs for all skins in this batch
Admin can update this list to add/remove skins
Each URI should be max 200 characters (Arweave/IPFS links)
fields.name: metadata_uris

docs: State of an individual loot box NFT (Metaplex Core)
types.name: BoxState

docs: Owner of the box NFT
fields.name: owner

docs: Batch this box belongs to
fields.name: batch_id

docs: Whether the box has been opened
fields.name: opened

docs: Hash of the assigned inventory item (zero if not assigned)
fields.name: assigned_inventory

docs: Core NFT asset address (single account for Core NFTs)
Replaces the old mint + token account pattern
fields.name: asset

docs: Timestamp when box was minted
fields.name: mint_time

docs: Timestamp when box was opened (zero if not opened)
fields.name: open_time

docs: Random index generated during opening
fields.name: random_index

docs: Whether the box has been redeemed (sold back)
fields.name: redeemed

docs: Timestamp when redeemed (zero if not redeemed)
fields.name: redeem_time

docs: Bump seed for PDA
fields.name: bump

docs: Global program state - singleton PDA with fixed seed "global"
types.name: Global

docs: Authority that can perform admin operations
fields.name: authority

docs: Oracle public key for price signature verification
fields.name: oracle_pubkey

docs: USDC mint address
fields.name: usdc_mint

docs: Whether buyback is currently enabled
fields.name: buyback_enabled

docs: Minimum treasury balance required for buybacks
fields.name: min_treasury_balance

docs: Current batch counter
fields.name: current_batch

docs: Total boxes minted across all batches
fields.name: total_boxes_minted

docs: Total successful buybacks
fields.name: total_buybacks

docs: Total USDC volume from buybacks
fields.name: total_buyback_volume

docs: Emergency pause flag (stops all user operations)
fields.name: paused

docs: Pending authority for 2-step transfer
fields.name: pending_authority

docs: Bump seed for PDA
fields.name: bump

docs: Oracle-signed price for an inventory item
types.name: PriceStore

docs: Hash of the inventory item ID
fields.name: inventory_id_hash

docs: Price in USDC (6 decimal places)
fields.name: price

docs: Timestamp when price was set
fields.name: timestamp

docs: Oracle that signed this price
fields.name: oracle

docs: Number of times this price has been updated
fields.name: update_count

docs: Bump seed for PDA
fields.name: bump

docs: Temporary state for pending VRF randomness requests
types.name: VrfPending

docs: Box mint that requested VRF
fields.name: box_mint

docs: VRF request ID (if using external VRF service)
fields.name: request_id

docs: Timestamp when VRF was requested
fields.name: request_time

docs: Pool size for random index calculation
fields.name: pool_size

docs: VRF randomness result (0 if not yet fulfilled)
fields.name: randomness

docs: User who requested the VRF (for closing account)
fields.name: user

docs: Bump seed for PDA
fields.name: bump
